page.title: 07 HOME LIFE
page.content: Life for children in Cannock is varied and exciting. Here are some extracts from some days in the lives of some junior school children from Chadsmoor school. FRIDAY 20th June 1985 ====== ==== ==== ==== "My mum woke me up with a cup of coffee. Then I went downstairs and had my breakfast of fried eggs,bacon, sausage and fried bread. After watching "Breakfast Television" I went to get dressed." SATURDAY 21st June 1985 ======== ==== ==== ==== When i realised it was Saturday I snuggled back into bed and I looked at my Liverpool Football Team poster on the wall. I picked up my "Eagle and Tiger" comic and settled down for a good read.
